## Emulator.startEventLoop() method

Starts the event loop for the ledger. If the event loop is already running, it is cleared and restarted. The event loop calls the stepForwardBlock method every 20 slots.

**Signature:**

```typescript
startEventLoop(): void;
```
**Returns:**

void
